name: MMO VR
description:
CAN YOU SURVIVE THE ONSLAUGHT?

    MMO VR is a post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, VR Shooter. Take down waves of enemies in a colosseum using nothing but your blaster and shield. How long can you survive the fight?

CREDITS:

Design:

-Jack Malboeuf

-Mike Morrone

Art:

-Matt Curro

-Arianna Terlitsky

Sound:

-John Fischer

-Greg Levinson
